translations: n.（Math）人名；（德）马特；（柬）马；（英）马思

sentences.sentence: I flunked math in second grade.
sentences.translation: 我二年级时数学不及格。

sentences.sentence: My math class is worth three credits.
sentences.translation: 我的数学课为三个学分。

sentences.sentence: I was always bottom of the class in math.
sentences.translation: 我的数学成绩总是班上最后一名。
